Name: Pet::Account Management::Update Address [ Unsupported State / State Not Covered ]
Description: pet policies are not available at AK, DE, FL, HI, ID, KS KY, LA, ME, MN, SD, VT, WV, WY
Content: Hey, Thank you for reaching out! Unfortunately, at this time, Lemonade pet insurance is not available in the state of [STATE] so we will need to cancel your policy. Right now, Lemonade pet health insurance is only available in the following states: AL, AR, AZ, CA, CO, CT, DC, GA, IA, IL, IN, MA, MD, MI, MO, MS, MT, ND, NE, NC, NH, NJ, NM, NV, NY, OH, OK, OR, PA, RI, SC, TN, TX, UT, VA, WA, WI Just a heads up in regards to canceling your pet policy: any illnesses that have happened until this point now become pre-existing, so we won't be able to cover them if you were to sign up again. The waiting periods on the policy would also restart. You can cancel your policy right through this link: https://lemonade.com/diy/cancel_policy Feel free to reach out if you need anything else or need help canceling when the time comes. Best, Maya
Input examples: I moved to a different state and need to update my address. The new address is: 1542 N Mountain Valley Highway Montville, ME 04941 Thank you, Joseph
Hi, is my insurance policy Global? or just US? I'm moving to the UK and would like to know if my policy will cover Maggie there
My home address has changed, how do I update that? we're at 1146 Laurie Rd W Roseville, MN 55113 Moved April 1, 2023 Thanks!

Name: Pet::Account Management::Update Address [ Pet Moved / Change Address / Moving ] [ ( Same Premium )]
Description: For address change when premium does not change with new address
Content: Hey, Thanks for sending that over! We were able to get your address updated on [PET NAME]'s policy, and your premium will remain the same, so you're all set! Let me know if you need help with anything else going forward! Best, Maya
Input examples: Hello Maya, The address on my policy is incorrect. It should read: 143 Pamlico Drive Holly Ridge NC 28445 There is no apt number, it is a single family owned by me. Sincerely yours, E Sent from my T-Mobile 5G Device Get Outlook for Android
i need to change my address for my policy. My new address is: 1127 Lafayette Ave #1, Brooklyn, NY 11221
Hi, I would like to request an address change for Ruby’s policy from 828 Embarcadero del Mar, Apt/Unit #unit k, Goleta, CA, 93117 to 383 Pacific Oaks Rd Goleta, CA 93117. Thank you!

Name: General Services::Dunning::Customer Canceled NOT Blocked (want to set up new policy) [start over, restart, reinstate]
Description: To be used when a customer who has been canceled due to dunning wants to set up new.
Content: Hi, I am so sorry that your policy was canceled! Once a policy is canceled we are not able to reinstate it, however, since this is your first occurrence of a policy being canceled due to non-payment, you can create a new one if you'd like! To create a new policy, just head over to lemonade.com or open the Lemonade mobile app and Maya will  get you started up again in a few seconds! If you have any questions please do not hesitate to ask! Be well, Maya
Input examples: Hello Maya, The address on my policy is incorrect. It should read: 143 Pamlico Drive Holly Ridge NC 28445 There is no apt number, it is a single family owned by me. Sincerely yours, E Sent from my T-Mobile 5G Device Get Outlook for Android
i need to change my address for my policy. My new address is: 1127 Lafayette Ave #1, Brooklyn, NY 11221
Hi, I would like to request an address change for Ruby’s policy from 828 Embarcadero del Mar, Apt/Unit #unit k, Goleta, CA, 93117 to 383 Pacific Oaks Rd Goleta, CA 93117. Thank you!
